title: Why can't I contact the warranty division. I hate this PS phone. I've been trying to get someone
content: I have gone to AT&T for help. They could not fix the problems with this phone. There r several issues. Called Assuriun they stated warranty problem. I have been trying everything. No one has been able to help. This has been going on since June. I hate this PIECE Of SHIT phone. I've been on every site that has been given to me. I've tried for over twenty hours with every contact I've been given.  Somebody please HELP
